variants.Description in input context: A G to A substitution at nucleotide 1166 results in the substitution of alanine for threonine at position 389 (p.Thr389Ala).
A G to C substitution at nucleotide 1233 results in the substitution of valine for proline at position 411 (p.Pro411Val).

Material used.Description: The experiments were performed using the HEK293 cell line and were cultured as previously described.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein levels were markedly reduced in samples carrying the p.Thr389Ala variant.
Protein levels were slightly reduced in samples carrying the p.Pro411Val variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type MAPT cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to determine statistical significance.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 20% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 20% of wild-type levels.
